meanings.sent1: The complaining customer demanded a refund.
meanings.sent2: She is always complaining about the weather.
meanings.sent3: The complaining child finally got a cookie to stop the whining.
meanings.sent4: The complaining engine made a loud screeching noise.
meanings.sent5: Her complaining tone filled the room with negativity.

meanings.definition: Making a formal accusation or charge.
meanings.sent1: He was complaining to the authorities about the unfair treatment.
meanings.sent2: The employee was caught complaining to HR about his manager.
meanings.sent3: She jokingly started complaining to the cat about the missing socks.
meanings.sent4: The thunderstorm was complaining loudly with its lightning strikes.
meanings.sent5: The lawyer was complaining fiercely in the courtroom.
